title: Battlestar Galactica Fanedits x265
description:
Battlestar.Galactica.Fanedits.x265

THIS TORRENT USES X265 HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) VIDEO
PLEASE USE A PLAYER THAT SUPPORTS X265 HEVC VIDEO LIKE VLC, POTPLAYER, ETC

THIS SHARE IS A COLLECTION of 10 FANEDITS BASED ON BSG 2003-2009
SOURCES WERE TAKEN DIRECTLY FROM BLURAY EXCEPT FOR ONE BLURAY ENCODE FROM THE WEB
IN ADDITION TO BSG, 2 BLOOD AND CHROME AND 1 PORTLANDIA FANEDITS ARE INCLUDED

Battlestar Galactica Fanedits x265: 2hour 04min 41sec 1,766,393,100bytes
Handbrake x64 0.10.3 20160122 x265 HEVC
video: 1x 480p crf=20.00 preset=veryslow (video ~674Kbps)
video: 9x 1080p crf=23.00to26.00 preset=medium (video ~1072Kbps to ~2328Kbps)
audio: 3x 2-channel HE-AAC 96Kbps AND 7x 6-channel HE-AAC 256Kbps

This is an x265 HEVC video, HE-AAC audio collection of 10 fanedits about the new Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009). 9 fanedits were sourced directly from the BSG Blu-Rays and the Portlandia fanedit was sourced from an AVC encode from Blu-Ray. These files have a complete and consistent naming scheme that includes the season#, disc#, file type, title, and a/v details. "z" was prepended to the 3 BSG-related fanedits so they are ordered after the BSG fanedits.

For descriptions of these fanedits, please see the NFO file for this share:
BSG.season3.brd-us.fanedit1.s3e02DoralAndBatlarSignIt.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.2003-2009MenuMontage.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.2004-2009TaikoDrumBlipvertMontage.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.AllAlongTheWatchtowerUpbeatMontage.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.JamesCallis-DavidEickIsMissing.480p.2ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.PreviouslySeenMontage.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
BSG.series.brd-us.fanedit1.RandDTVEndCreditLogosComplete.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265
zBAC.movie.brd-us.fanedit1.BloodAndChromeExtendedTrailer.1080p.2ch.0subs.x265
zBAC.movie.brd-us.fanedit1.BloodAndChromeWonderconTrailer.1080p.2ch.0subs.x265
zPRT.s02e02.brd-us.fanedit1.OneMooreEpisodeOnlyBSG.1080p.6ch.0subs.x265

The file names are structured like this:
BSG.season[#]-[disc#].[source].[type#].[title].[resolution].[audio].[#-of-subs].x265

BSG: Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009)
zBAC: Battlestar Galactica Blood & Chrome (2012)
zPRT: Portlandia (2012)
